meanings.sent1: She repined about the rainy weather all day.
meanings.sent2: He often repined about his difficult work schedule.
meanings.sent3: The cat repined when it ran out of treats.
meanings.sent4: The old tree repined as the wind shook its branches.
meanings.sent5: The child repined loudly when told it was bedtime.

meanings.sent1: She repined for the delicious cake she saw in the bakery window.
meanings.sent2: He repined for the days when he could run and play without pain.
meanings.sent3: The dog repined for the ball that rolled under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The bird repined for the freedom of the open sky.
meanings.sent5: The student repined for the upcoming summer break.
